description:
Upward Mobility’s NCLEX-RN app for Palm webOS is a valuable tool to help you pass this important exam. 

This practice exam/review module contains 780 questions written by professional writers with concise, but detailed explanations to help you prepare for this test.  

While this module is designed for the NCLEX exam, it would also be helpful on medical board tests such as the USMLE, the MCAT, other international licensure tests, and any other professional  exam that requires deep knowledge in the topic areas below.  
 
Topics include:

-Safe and Effective Care Environment Questions
-Health Promotion and Maintenance Questions
-Psychosocial Integrity Questions
-Physiological Integrity Questions

About the NCLEX Exam

NCLEX (National Council Licensure EXamination) is an examination for the licensing of nurses in the United States.   The NCLEX is administered by the National Council of State Boards of Nursing.

This app is not affiliated with nor endorsed by the NCSBN.

About Upward Mobility

Upward Mobility creates high end professional educational content for management development and test preparation, and makes it available through mobile apps. Our goal is to keep learners engaged with a mix of wit, humor and actionable takeaways while meeting our customer's specific educational needs.

We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

Upward Mobility cares deeply about its products, and you can contact us from the home screen of all of our apps.
